Ray - Class in physics
represents a ray pointing from a specified point in a specified direction

raycast(Ray, int) - Static method in class physics.Physics
Raycast method
Info: layer | RAYCAST_ALL in order to ignore the isBlocking value in collider
raycast(Ray, int, ArrayList<Collider>) - Static method in class physics.Physics
Raycast method with ability to ignore certain objects
Info: layer | RAYCAST_ALL in order to ignore the isBlocking value in collider
RAYCAST_ALL - Static variable in class physics.Physics
This value is intended for raycasting in order to ignore the isBlocking value it can be used with bitwise or on the layer
